name: Instant Pot® Bone Broth with Turmeric and Ginger
author: Fioa
summary: Make this marvelous and nutritious bone broth in your Instant Pot® with your chicken scraps, seasoned with turmeric and ginger; a great complement to a clean eating diet. This broth can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days, or can be  frozen for 3 months.
ingredients: 4 cups warm water, or as needed
directions: Combine chicken carcass, carrots, celery, vinegar, turmeric, garlic, and ginger in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Add enough water to cover bones and vegetables in the pot
Select Manual function and set timer for 120 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
Let cool slightly and strain using a fine metal strainer to remove all the bits of bones and vegetables
